description: Test fixture for Ralph orchestrator integration testing

tasks.title: Add multiply function
tasks.description: Add a multiply function to the main module that multiplies two numbers.
acceptanceCriteria: Run `python -c "from src.main import multiply; assert multiply(3, 4) == 12"` - exits with code 0

tasks.title: Add tests for multiply function
tasks.description: Add unit tests for the multiply function to ensure it works correctly.
acceptanceCriteria: Run `python -m pytest tests/test_main.py -v -k multiply` - exits with code 0
